# OmniOmicsR

End-to-end R multi-omics processing (import → QC → normalize → batch → integrate → visualize → export).

```r
# install.packages("remotes"); remotes::install_github("your-org/OmniOmicsR")
library(OmniOmicsR)
f <- system.file("extdata/example_counts.csv", package = "OmniOmicsR")
rna <- read_omics_matrix(f, omics_type = "rna") |>
  qc_basic() |>
  normalize_tmm()
plot_qc(rna)
```
